title: Do Meghan Markle, Prince Harry vote in US election? Here is what we know
content: Meghan Markle is a US citizen but Prince Harry has not yet got US citizenship despite living in California for the last four years because of the row over his visa issue. Prince Harry in his memoir 'Spare' revealed that he took drugs which should have disqualified him for a US visa but he got one. And that started the row which is yet to be resolved. But Harry and Meghan had had rough trysts with the US election.
summary: Meghan Markle is a US citizen but Prince Harry has not yet got US citizenship despite living in California for the last four years because of the row over his visa issue. Prince Harry in his memoir 'Spare' revealed that he took drugs which should have disqualified him for a US visa but he got one. And that started the row which is yet to be resolved. But Harry and Meghan had had rough trysts with the US election.

title: Ivanka skips father's 'Women for Trump' rally on election eve, posts this on social media instead
content: Donald Trump's 'Women for Trump' rally on the eve of election day was neither attended by Melania nor Ivanka Trump. From his family, the two women on the stage were his other daughter Tiffany and his daughter-in-law Lara Trump. Ivanka Trump who was a part of the former Trump administration announced her exit from politics but did not even post anything for father's re-election bid.
summary: Donald Trump's 'Women for Trump' rally on the eve of election day was neither attended by Melania nor Ivanka Trump. From his family, the two women on the stage were his other daughter Tiffany and his daughter-in-law Lara Trump. Ivanka Trump who was a part of the former Trump administration announced her exit from politics but did not even post anything for father's re-election bid.

title: British Queen Camilla cancels events this week due to chest infection
content: Queen Camilla has postponed her engagements this week due to a chest infection, as confirmed by Buckingham Palace. Her doctors have advised rest, leading to her withdrawal from events like the Field of Remembrance opening ceremony. The Duchess of Gloucester will replace her at the ceremony. Camilla hopes to recover before the weekend's Remembrance events.
summary: Queen Camilla has postponed her engagements this week due to a chest infection, as confirmed by Buckingham Palace. Her doctors have advised rest, leading to her withdrawal from events like the Field of Remembrance opening ceremony. The Duchess of Gloucester will replace her at the ceremony. Camilla hopes to recover before the weekend's Remembrance events.

title: Home Depot co-founder, GOP donor Megadonor Bernard Marcus passes away
content: Home Depot co-founder and prominent GOP donor, Bernard Marcus, has died at 95. Known for his philanthropy, Marcus and his wife pledged a majority of their wealth to charitable causes. He was a staunch supporter of conservative politics, contributing significantly to figures like Donald Trump and Ron DeSantis.
summary: Home Depot co-founder and prominent GOP donor, Bernard Marcus, has died at 95.  Known for his philanthropy, Marcus and his wife pledged a majority of their wealth to charitable causes.  He was a staunch supporter of conservative politics, contributing significantly to figures like Donald Trump and Ron DeSantis.

title: US elections 2024: Sunita Williams to cast her vote from space, here is how
content: NASA astronaut Sunita Williams is poised to make history by casting her vote in the upcoming US presidential election from the International Space Station (ISS), approximately 400 km above Earth. Following a process similar to absentee voting, Williams will submit her ballot electronically via NASA's secure communication network.
summary: NASA astronaut Sunita Williams is poised to make history by casting her vote in the upcoming US presidential election from the International Space Station (ISS), approximately 400 km above Earth. Following a process similar to absentee voting, Williams will submit her ballot electronically via NASA's secure communication network.

title: Equatorial Guinea official under investigation after over 400 explicit videos found on his computer
content: Baltasar Ebang Engonga, Equatorial Guinea's top financial investigator, is embroiled in a scandal after explicit videos surfaced online, allegedly showing him in compromising situations with various women, including relatives of high-ranking officials. The discovery, made during a fraud investigation into Engonga, has sparked public outrage and prompted investigations into potential health risks and privacy breaches.
summary: Baltasar Ebang Engonga, Equatorial Guinea's top financial investigator, is embroiled in a scandal after explicit videos surfaced online, allegedly showing him in compromising situations with various women, including relatives of high-ranking officials. The discovery, made during a fraud investigation into Engonga, has sparked public outrage and prompted investigations into potential health risks and privacy breaches.

title: 'My life has come to an end': TikTok star Bella Bradford announces her death in pre-recorded video
content: TikTok star Bella Bradford, known for her fashion videos, posthumously shared a final message with her followers on October 31st. Diagnosed with a rare cancer at 22, Bradford bravely documented her journey, including her transition to palliative care. In her farewell video, she expressed gratitude for her followers' support, encouraging them to find joy in life's everyday moments.
summary: TikTok star Bella Bradford, known for her fashion videos, posthumously shared a final message with her followers on October 31st.  Diagnosed with a rare cancer at 22, Bradford bravely documented her journey, including her transition to palliative care.  In her farewell video, she expressed gratitude for her followers' support, encouraging them to find joy in life's everyday moments.

title: 200 Bangladeshis abducted during Hasina regime still missing: Inquiry
content: A commission investigating enforced disappearances in Bangladesh has reported that around 200 people abducted during former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's rule remain missing. The commission discovered secret detention centers and evidence suggesting efforts to conceal them. They attribute the disappearances to abuses by security forces, particularly the Rapid Action Battalion, and systemic failures within the government and judiciary.
summary: A commission investigating enforced disappearances in Bangladesh has reported that around 200 people abducted during former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's rule remain missing.  The commission discovered secret detention centers and evidence suggesting efforts to conceal them.  They attribute the disappearances to abuses by security forces, particularly the Rapid Action Battalion, and systemic failures within the government and judiciary.

title: Erdogan ally floats Turkey constitutional amendment to let him extend his tenure
content: Devlet Bahceli, a key ally of Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan, has proposed a constitutional amendment that would allow Erdogan to seek re-election in 2028. This comes after Erdogan secured his current and supposedly final term last year.
summary: Devlet Bahceli, a key ally of Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan, has proposed a constitutional amendment that would allow Erdogan to seek re-election in 2028. This comes after Erdogan secured his current and supposedly final term last year.

Tropical Storm Rafael forms in Caribbean, to strengthen into hurricane before landfall in Cuba
content: Tropical Storm Rafael, anticipated to escalate into a hurricane, is projected to hit Florida later this week. The storm, currently south of Jamaica, will likely impact the Cayman Islands and Cuba with heavy rainfall, posing risks of floods and mudslides.
summary: Tropical Storm Rafael, anticipated to escalate into a hurricane, is projected to hit Florida later this week. The storm, currently south of Jamaica, will likely impact the Cayman Islands and Cuba with heavy rainfall, posing risks of floods and mudslides.

Popular podcaster Joe Rogan endorses former US President Donald Trump ahead of elections
content: Joe Rogan, host of the popular podcast "The Joe Rogan Experience," publicly endorsed Donald Trump for president. This follows a lengthy interview where Trump discussed his presidency, the 2020 election, and even showed a scar from an alleged assassination attempt. Elon Musk joined the podcast to echo support for Trump and criticize the Democratic party.
summary: Joe Rogan, host of the popular podcast "The Joe Rogan Experience," publicly endorsed Donald Trump for president. This follows a lengthy interview where Trump discussed his presidency, the 2020 election, and even showed a scar from an alleged assassination attempt.  Elon Musk joined the podcast to echo support for Trump and criticize the Democratic party.

title: Watch: Russia launches Soyuz rocket with Iranian satellites into orbit
content: Russia launched a Soyuz rocket carrying two Ionosfera-M satellites for space weather monitoring and 53 smaller satellites, including two from Iran. This launch marks Iran's first private sector venture into space and highlights growing cooperation between Moscow and Tehran amidst Western accusations of Iranian drone supplies to Russia for the Ukraine conflict.
summary: Russia launched a Soyuz rocket carrying two Ionosfera-M satellites for space weather monitoring and 53 smaller satellites, including two from Iran. This launch marks Iran's first private sector venture into space and highlights growing cooperation between Moscow and Tehran amidst Western accusations of Iranian drone supplies to Russia for the Ukraine conflict.

title: Michael Moore confident of Kamala Harris win: 'MAGA people are going to be...'
content: ​Moore said the Trump campaign isn't really in touch with where the majority of Americans are at. “The majority of Americans do not want this divisiveness, they don’t want the threat of violence,” Moore said. Moore also presented analyst Rachel Bitecofer's prediction which discussed the popular predictions including Silver Nate's and Ann Selzer's and concluded that her gut says it's Harris.
summary: ​Moore said the Trump campaign isn't really in touch with where the majority of Americans are at. “The majority of Americans do not want this divisiveness, they don’t want the threat of violence,” Moore said. Moore also presented analyst Rachel Bitecofer's prediction which discussed the popular predictions including Silver Nate's and Ann Selzer's and concluded that her gut says it's Harris.
